disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional advice. Please consult with a licensed architect or engineer before proceeding with any construction or renovation.

rooms.description: Spacious living area integrated with natural light and ventilation, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the north-east wall for maximum sunlight, as per Vastu recommendations.
Functional kitchen designed with compact storage and floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to allow morning light, ensuring efficient natural ventilation.
Cozy dining space adjoining the living room with large windows ensuring ample daylight and cross ventilation.
Private bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south-west to balance energy as per Vastu, ensuring comfort and privacy.
Compact bathroom designed with functional plumbing layout and natural ventilation windows placed high on the wall.

openings.description: Large entrance door with glass panel to maximize natural light and provide a welcoming facade.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the rear wall for ventilation and to balance energy as per Vastu.

vastu_considerations: The design incorporates Vastu principles by placing the living room and kitchen in the north-east quadrant to harness sunlight, while positioning the bedroom in the south-west for balance.
budget_notes: Cost-effective materials and modular layouts have been prioritized to adhere to a tight budget without compromising on natural light and ventilation.
